text: Ron assume that K these recommendations
are according to Quran and Sunnah the
prophets teachings no one can dispute
that what do you say to people who
criticize your recommendation and say
that this allows men to abuse women that
this allows for the humiliation of women
in a marriage when we draft a bill
concerning women we have to consider all
possible situations if a woman does not
fulfill her responsibilities in marriage
first you advise if that doesn't work
then you consult her relatives if that
doesn't work then you deserve her in all
of this doesn't work then like meeting
some men will take what you said as an
excuse to abuse their wives they're
going to say well my wife hasn't
fulfilled her responsibilities and so
the Council of Islamic ideology has said
that it was okay for me to beat her
takagi then you tell me what is the
solution to this issue if a woman
doesn't respond to advice doesn't listen
to her relatives after you have used all
the options what should be done if a man
doesn't fulfill his responsibilities
what should a woman do sabelli first she
can involve someone from the family to
resolve the issue but in the end if they
feel they can't live together she has
the right to get a divorce this
particular recommendation has created a
huge controversy within the Pakistani
society it's been reported in the
international media and I'm wondering
that seeing all of this if you might
change your mind
society is not the media they are two
different things and we will not
reconsider the recommendations this is
according to the Quran you cannot ask
someone to reconsider the Quran
